summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services, authorizing applications to and agreements with King County for financial assistance for the operation of the Seattle Veterans' Action Center and with the Seattle P-Patch Advisory Council for financial assistance for the development and operation of P-Patch garden sites; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1994 and 1995 Budgets of the Department of Housing and Human Services, creating a position and making the necessary reimbursable appropriations therefor.
committee: Health, Human Services, Education and Libraries
